actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to terminate the State government share of funds allocated to the States beginning with fiscal year 1980.

summary.text: Amends the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to terminate, beginning with fiscal year 1980, the State government share of revenue sharing funds without affecting the local government share.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to terminate the State government share of funds allocated to the States beginning with fiscal year 1980.
